name: Alien Blaster (Shockwave)
description:
"The Craglordion empire attacks home world! Shoot enemy to gain boost and destroy the alien mother ship in this 3D rails shooter"

4 unique levels.
All angles space combat.
Craglordians.
Space game.
Shoot alien to gain boost!

Student game.
On rails shooter developed by team Shockwave at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Art
Henrik Andersson - Maximilian Bergström - Pontus Canbäck - Dennis Praetorius 

Level Design
Jonas Astberg - Hannes Bensryd - Oscar Maris

Programming
Mattias Anderson -Mattias Blomgren - Karl Brunzell - Henrik Phan - Mikkel Ravnholt

Technical Art
Adam Andersson - Nathalie Börgesen - Dan Sönne

Original Release: 14/11/2018
1st project developed by Shockwave.
